segments.text: I notice the water spilling over the sink edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a puddle that's getting bigger by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is focused on her plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't see the mess at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water waste, it's just pouring out uselessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy on the stool, grabbing cookies like it's nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is wide open, crumbs probably everywhere soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is waiting eagerly, hand up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks dirty from the floor, and now it's tipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is turning into a sloppy mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is neat and clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's gross how unaware they all are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't want to clean up after this.
segments.speaker: PAR
